mapper.select:
select sum(acbalance) as acbalance,sum(fulltrans) as fulltrans,sum(bankcard) as bankcard, sum(xianjin) as xianjin,sum(shiyou) as shiyou,sum(shihua) as shihua,sum(jingbo) as jingbo, sum(qichu) as qichu from (
-- 当天回款金额(transfee) select sum(transfee) as acbalance,0 as fulltrans,0 as bankcard,0 as xianjin,0 as shiyou,0 as shihua,0 as jingbo,0 as qichu from gc_kehu where receipt in ('预有','有') and receiptdate = #{endDate}
union all
select 0 as acbalance,sum(fulltrans) as fulltrans,sum(bankcard) as bankcard, sum(xianjin) as xianjin,sum(shiyou) as shiyou,sum(shihua) as shihua,sum(jingbo) as jingbo, 0 as qichu from ( -- 第一次付款金额 select 0 as acbalance, sum(case when pay_type = '运满满' then fulltrans else 0 end) as fulltrans, sum(case when pay_type = '农行卡' then fulltrans else 0 end) as bankcard, sum(case when pay_type = '现金' then fulltrans else 0 end) as xianjin, sum(case when pay_type = '百通石油' then fulltrans else 0 end) as shiyou, sum(case when pay_type = '百通石化' then fulltrans else 0 end) as shihua, sum(case when pay_type = '百通京博' then fulltrans else 0 end) as jingbo, 0 as qichu from gc_kehu where receipt in ('预有','有') and fulpaydate = #{endDate} group by pay_type
union all
-- 第二次付款金额 select 0 as acbalance, sum(case when forwunit = '运满满' then bankcard else 0 end) as fulltrans, sum(case when forwunit = '农行卡' then bankcard else 0 end) as bankcard, sum(case when forwunit = '现金' then bankcard else 0 end) as xianjin, sum(case when forwunit = '百通石油' then bankcard else 0 end) as shiyou, sum(case when forwunit = '百通石化' then bankcard else 0 end) as shihua, sum(case when forwunit = '百通京博' then bankcard else 0 end) as jingbo, 0 as qichu from gc_kehu where receipt in ('预有','有')
and bankpaydate = #{endDate} group by forwunit
) t
union all -- 期初余额（等于当月的所有余额累计）
select 0 as acbalance,0 as fulltrans,0 as bankcard,0 as xianjin,0 as shiyou,0 as shihua,0 as jingbo, (transfee - fulltrans - bankcard) as qichu from ( select sum(transfee) as transfee, sum(case when fulpaydate>= #{startDate} and fulpaydate< #{endDate} then fulltrans else 0 end) as fulltrans, sum(case when bankpaydate>= #{startDate} and bankpaydate< #{endDate} then bankcard else 0 end) as bankcard from gc_kehu where receipt in ('预有','有') and receiptdate >= #{startDate} and receiptdate < #{endDate} ) t
) t
